abstract: Editorial warns it is unlikely that upcoming Paris talks on climate change will result in defined planet-saving agreement; expresses hope countries involved in talks will come away with shared sense of urgency about problem of global warming, and will have firm and strong commitments to reduction of greenhouse gas emissions.
lead_paragraph: The conference will succeed if it fosters a sense in countries large and small that all must play a part in finding a solution.

headline.main: What the Paris Climate Meeting Must Do
headline.print_headline: What the Climate Meeting Must Do

snippet: The conference will succeed if it fosters a sense in countries large and small that all must play a part in finding a solution.

keywords.value: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change
keywords.name: subject
